import React, {Component} from 'react'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' const CartHeader = ({item, total, symbol, removeFromCart}) => (
  • {item.hasOwnProperty("DOTD") ?

    {item.name}

    {item.qty} x {symbol} {(item.sum)}

    :

    {item.name}

    {item.qty} x {symbol} {(item.sum)}

    }
    • ) export default CartHeader;
